episodes.title: Episode 71: Tony Alamo: Cult Leader is Arkansas (Part 2)
episodes.description: In this episode of Unexplained Arkansas, your host Lisa will discuss the Tony & Susan Alamo and the Alamo Christian Foundation...or better known know as the Tony Alamo Christian Ministries. In this part 2, we will discuss the years between 1982-2017; during this time Tony amps up his crazy with assaulting and yelling at his followers; lawsuits, FBI raids, and finally an ending he deserves....175 years in prison. References for this Episode: Ministry of Evil: link to documentary info: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt8014800/ https://encyclopediaofarkansas.net/entries/tony-alamo-4224/ https://www.tonyalamonews.com/255/tony-susan-alamo-foundation-time-line.php https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/intelligence-report/2008/christhiaon-coie-speaks-out-about-her-stepfather-tony-alamo https://www.familiesagainstcultthreats.org/ ⁠⁠⁠⁠ Original Music provided exclusively for Unexplained Arkansas The Podcast by Gage Fears--Instagram below: https://www.instagram.com/i_deliver_pizza/ To connect w/ Unexplained Arkansas: https://unexplainedarkansas.squarespace.com/ unexplainedarkansas@gmail.com https://www.facebook.com/groups/unexplainedarkansas/ https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=unexplained+arkansas https://www.patreon.com/c/unexplainedarkansas Find us on Tik Tok and Instagram and all Podcasts Platforms. Xoxoxoxo, Lisa

episodes.title: Episode 70: Tony Alamo: Cult Leader in Arkansas (Part 1)
episodes.description:
In this episode of Unexplained Arkansas, your host Lisa will discuss the Tony & Susan Alamo and the Alamo Christian Foundation...or better known know as the Tony Alamo Christian Ministries. 


Part 1 will cover the back story of the Alamo's, them meeting, starting the foundation, up until 1982 when Susan passes away and the foundation do not bury her....stay tuned for more to come Thursday January 16, 2025.


References for this Episode:
